A table to know what a hundred waight commeth to from a farthing the pound, to 2'-6d the pound. Newton, John, 1622-1678.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : table
Printed for George Lindsey, and are to be sold over against London-Stone, London : [1645]
Author's name and imprint date from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "march 22th 1644". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
